name: Armenia
description: Spring rains are interspersed with bright sunshine, while fields are covered in canopies of wildflowers. Temperatures become warm and walking trails in mountain foothill areas start to open up. Generally one of the best times to visit the region.

name: Austria
description: Cities are a delight on spring days: uncrowded and often warm. A hike to a mountain Alm (meadow) becomes a romp through flowers, and from April onwards all sights and activities flick to summer schedules.

name: Azerbaijan
description: Spring rains are interspersed with bright sunshine, while fields are covered in canopies of wildflowers. Temperatures become warm and walking trails in mountain foothill areas start to open up. Generally one of the best times to visit the region.

name: Belgium
description: A great travelling month with long, long days and mild weather.

name: Congo, the Democratic Republic of the
Croatia
description: It's sunny and warm on the coast, and you can take a dip in the sea. Hotels are cheaper, too, and crowds have yet to come. Cafe life in Zagreb and Split kicks into full gear.

name: Cyprus
description: A great month to visit, with plenty of towel space on the sand, an average temperature of 26°C and warmer evenings for dining alfresco.

name: Czech Republic
description: Book accommodation well in advance, and expect to pay top dollar.

name: Denmark
description: The sun comes out on a semi-permanent basis, more warm-weather attractions open, and the events calendar starts filling as Danes throw off winter's gloom. Tourists have yet to arrive in great numbers.

name: Estonia
description: The days are noticeably longer now as weather conditions dramatically improve. Tourist-focused businesses start revving their engines; excitement fills the air in anticipation of a fruitful summer.

name: Finland
description: A transitional month in the north, with snow beginning to disappear and signs of life emerging after the long winter. In the south, spring's in full flow. It's a quiet but rewarding time to visit.

name: France
description: There is no lovelier month to travel in France, as the first melons ripen in Provence and outdoor markets burst with new-found colour. Spring is always in.

name: Georgia
description: Spring rains are interspersed with bright sunshine, while fields are covered in canopies of wildflowers. Temperatures become warm and walking trails in mountain foothill areas start to open up. Generally one of the best times to visit the region.

name: Germany
description: One of the loveliest months, often surprisingly warm and sunny, perfect for ringing in beer garden season. Plenty of public holidays, which Germans turn into extended weekends or miniholidays, meaning busy roads and lodging shortages.

name: Greece
description: If you're planning to go hiking, May is a great time to hit Greece's trails. Temperatures are relatively mild and wildflowers create a huge splash of colour. Local produce fills Greek kitchens.

name: Hungary
description: The selection of fresh vegetables and fruit is not great in winter, but in spring a cycle of bounty begins, starting with asparagus.

name: Iceland
description: May is shoulder season, and isn't a bad month to visit, just before the tourist season cranks up in earnest. Enjoy prices before they escalate, plus lengthening days, spring wildflowers and first-rate birdwatching.

name: Ireland
description: The May Bank Holiday (on the first Monday) sees the first of the busy summer weekends as the Irish take to the roads to enjoy the budding good weather.

name: Italy
description: The month of roses and cultural festivals is a perfect time to travel. The weather is warm but not too hot, and prices are good value. Especially good for walkers.

name: Latvia
description: The days are noticeably longer now as weather conditions dramatically improve. Tourist-focused businesses start revving their engines; excitement fills the air in anticipation of a fruitful summer.

name: Lithuania
description: The days are noticeably longer now as weather conditions dramatically improve. Tourist-focused businesses start revving their engines; excitement fills the air in anticipation of a fruitful summer.

name: Netherlands
description: Alternating rainy and gorgeous weather and plenty of historic events make post-King's Day a perfect time to explore the country. Hope for a balmy weekend to get out and visit the windmills.

name: Norway
description: By May, Norway has a real spring in its step: the weather's warming up, Norway's renowned music festivals get under way and tourists have yet to arrive in great numbers.

name: Poland
description: May finally brings the return of reliably decent weather, flowers in bloom, and the sound of happy students about to be freed from school. In Krakow, during Juvenalia, the students actually take over the city.

name: Portugal
description: Lovely sunny weather and the lack of peak-season crowds make May an ideal time to visit. The beaches of the Algarve awake from their slumber and see a smattering of travellers passing through.

name: Romania
description: Temperatures warm a bit in May, but expect intervals of rain. Romanians traditionally spend the Labour Day holiday (1 May) at the seashore, but it's still too cold to swim. Birdwatching starts in the Danube Delta.

name: Slovenia
description: Hit the Alpine valleys for a breakout of mountain wildflowers. Expect sunshine and warm daytime temperatures. It's too cold yet to swim in the Adriatic, but days are ideal for a portside promenade.

name: South Georgia and the South Sandwich Islands
Spain
description: A glorious time to be in Spain, May sees the countryside carpeted with spring wildflowers and it feels like summer is just around the corner.

name: Sweden
description: Spring tourism starts to pick up as the days get longer and warmer; summer-only hostels and campgrounds start to open for the season.

name: Turkey
description: Another good month to visit. Shoulder season continues outside Istanbul, with attendant savings, but spring is flirting with summer and the Aegean and Mediterranean beaches are heating up.

name: Ukraine
description: Ukraine is most definitely a shoulder-season destination and May is the first of those shoulders. Colour returns to the snow-bleached land, the last river ice fades and the first seedlings nudge through Ukraine's black soil.

name: United Kingdom
description: The weather is usually good, with more events to enjoy. There are two public holidays this month (the first and last Mondays) so traffic is very busy over the corresponding long weekends.
